DOC.brief_summary: This study examine effect online behavioral intervention promote weight loss low income postpartum woman WIC program .
DOC.brief_title: Prevention Postpartum Weight Retention Low Income WIC Women
DOC.detailed_description: This program design reduce postpartum weight retention low income woman WIC program . The weight loss program deliver internet use behavioral weight loss technique .
DOC.criteria: Women Age 1840 year . Delivery within 652 week Exceed prepregnancy weight least 4.5 kg ( 10 pound ) current body mass index ( BMI ) > /= 25 Current BMI > 22 English Spanish speaking Has internet access home landline Literacy least 5th grade read level Has cell phone Pregnant planning become pregnant Relocating next year Serious psychological problem ( untreated depression , schizophrenia , bipolar disorder ) medical problem ( i.e . heart disease , cancer , renal disease diabetes ) , physician supervision diet exercise prescription need .
